colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI PE'I LE 'CHI MED RDO RJE'I MNGA' 'BANGS DGE LEGS RGYAS ZHES BGYI BA, RANG GI DPE CHA SNYING PO 'DI BCOS NAS STENG DU BSNAN TE BGYID PA 'AM SNYAM PA BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS @008B RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'I DPE CHA 'DI LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN BYED PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
